This page lists all of the classified listings your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these classified listings and delete offensive material if necessary. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific blog entries. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the blog entries on your social network.

column2: There are no classified listings by your members yet.
Are you sure that you want to delete this classified listing? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.
Are you sure that you want to delete this category? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.

If you want to allow your users to categorize their classified entries, create the categories below. This feature is useful if you want to list all your users' classified entries that If you have no categories, your users will not be given the option of assigning a classified category.

These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

column1: Do you want to let members view classifieds? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members view classifieds? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow classifieds to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow classifieds to be viewed.

column1: Yes, allow viewing of all classifieds, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow viewing of all classifieds, even private ones.

column1: Do you want to let members edit classifieds? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members edit classifieds? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to edit their classifieds.
column2: No, do not allow members to edit their classifieds.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit their own classifieds.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit their own classifieds.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit all classifieds.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit all classifieds.

column1: Do you want to let members delete classifieds? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members delete classifieds? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to delete their classifieds.
column2: No, do not allow members to delete their classifieds.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete their own classifieds.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete their own classifieds.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete all classifieds.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete all classifieds.

column1: No, do not allow classifieds to be created.
column2: No, do not allow classifieds to be created.

column1: Do you want to let members upload photos to a classified listing? If set to no, the option to upload photos will not appear.
column2: Do you want to let members upload photos to a classified listing? If set to no, the option to upload photos will not appear.

column1: Yes, allow photo uploading to classifieds.
column2: Yes, allow photo uploading to classifieds.

column1: No, do not allow photo uploading.
column2: No, do not allow photo uploading.

Do you want to let members create classifieds? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view classifieds, but only want certain levels to be able to create classifieds.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their classified listings. These options appear on your members' "Add Listings" and "Edit Entry" pages. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view classifieds.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their listings. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post comments on listings.

column1: Enter the maximum number of allowed classifieds. The field must contain an integer between 1 and 999.
column2: Enter the maximum number of allowed classifieds. The field must contain an integer between 1 and 999.

column1: These settings affect all members in your community.
column2: These settings affect all members in your community.

Select whether or not you want to let the public (visitors that are not logged-in) to view the following sections of your social network. In some cases (such as Profiles, Blogs, and Albums), if you have given them the option, your users will be able to make their pages private even though you have made them publically viewable here. For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.

column1: Yes, the public can view classifieds unless they are made private.
column2: Yes, the public can view classifieds unless they are made private.

column1: No, the public cannot view classifieds.
column2: No, the public cannot view classifieds.
